title: 这个插件怎么给普通玩家权限
author: 地龙丶
txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-184780-1-1.html 20金币啊 这个插件怎么给普通玩家权限

replies.author: mmmmmmmm丶浅瞳
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp default blockhunt.player
/mangaddp default libdisguises.disguiseentity.*
/mangaddp default disguisecraft.object.block.*
/mangaddp default blockhunt.shop
/mangaddp default blockhunt.list
/mangaddp default blockhunt.leave
/mangaddp default blockhunt.join
/mangaddp default blockhunt.help
/mangaddp default blockhunt.info

依次输入上面指令，应该可以的~~~
这是给玩家加入权  离开权  打开商店权  打开帮助权 查看所有游戏权 变身方块权
